Description

Alt Shift is an indie game studio located in the sunny South of France, in the city of Montpellier. We design and develop videogames for PC, Mac and mobile platforms. We also help other companies to create sexy web and mobile app using gamification methods.

History

2010 - 2012: Birth and research program

Research and development on new MMORPG server technologies. Design and development of the geosocial game project: Besyde - Mask of Harmony.

2013 - 2016: "Serious" web and mobile app projects

Consulting, design and development of web / mobile games and applications for various types of clients, from start-ups to large companies and institutions. Few examples: EDF (Ekosmart), Sud de France Développement (WineHub / Foodhub / ConnecSud), ENEO (BiodivGo), ComWatt, Institut Montpellier Management, Acrétion, etc.

2016 - 2018: Back into the game

Design and development of the mobile game Not Not - A brain buster, released in May 2017. Design and development of Crying Suns, soon available (Q4 2018).

Projects

  • Crying Suns
